name: Escada Pink Tweed Poodle Lining Blazer and Skirt Suit
description:
Escada. You got me at Escada. One of my favorite designers of all time. This suit is handcrafted to perfection. It can be worn as a set looking "oh so smart" or worn as separates. I would wear the jacket with something to finish with an androgynous ultimate sexy, yet strong look. Wear a concert tee, some patterned leggings, boots and your set. You can also make this classy to stand out for an interview or as a conversation starter. Wear the skirt with a lace cami and heels. So many ways and the best is IT WILL NEVER GO OUT OF STYLE! Swoop it quick as it is on it's way from NY now!

name: Jessica McClintock Vintage Lace Blouse
description:
*Click on pixtures to enlarge!

Beautiful lace floral top made in the early 1980's obviously still influenced by the Gunne Sax (granny dresses era from the 70's) but more updated and with lush fabrics. This is when Jessica McClintock made a more expensive upscale collection which makes this piece very special and hard to come by. It has swiss dot, floral lace and scalloped edges. The four buttons and five button back closure ensure not only an amazing fit but a sexy detail.This top is perfect to layer under a blazer with a highwaisted skirt and pumps for work or perfect paired with jeans or a maxi skirt, sunnies and platforms to have some fun!
 
The Details 

Circa: 1970's 
Label: Jessica Mc Clintock (label was cutout but came with skirt as shown in products and owner verified)

We looked up similar blazers and we think she is right. The original tags are not in tact but either way the Kitami Ropa price is a steal! Wear this for a work as a stand out blazer. Dress up a LBD. Wear it with jeans or even shorts. The possibilities are endless! This is one of our fav's and is put on our floor in flagship store in San Francisco! It will be swooped up very quickly so get it while it is here! The size will fit most. You can wear it a lil big and it looks great (see pictures) or to fit up to a 16 (it says 14)! name: Chanel Vintage Cardigan
description:
Authentic scoopneck, Rose engrained buttoned long sleeve with two front pocket Chanel sweater. To have a unique Chanel Vintage piece of clothing is every fashionistas dream! You will not find this price for this amazing sweater anywhere. So perfectly structured we can see why Chanel is so sought after. It is impeccable in fit and will work with every era, therefore, staying with you through life. The Rose Buttons make the perfect touch to this navy/black color block cardigan. It can be dressed up or down. It is the best investment if you happen to not be happy and take care of it you can sell this for double where you find it here on EBAY. Trust we know. We chose to extend these amazing deals to KR Dolls. The blazer sold right out of the box in our flagship store, this is going to sell fast at this price as well.
Get it and rock it dolls!

name: Jessica McClintock Vintage Lace Skirt
description:
*Click on pixtures to enlarge!

Beautiful lace floral skirt made in the early 1980's which was obviously still influenced by the Gunne Sax (granny dresses era from the 70's) but this collection was updated with lush fabrics. This is when Jessica McClintock started a more expensive upscale collection. It has swiss dot, floral lace, scalloped edges and three tiers with amazing lace trim detail. The front has a "V" detail which in known to make the waist look slimmer. The zipper enclosure ensure a perfect fit. The skirt is partially lined down to the first tier allowing some sexy skin to show. This maxi skirt is perfect worn with a tucked or cut off rocker tee and motorcyle boots or totally feminine with a sweet tank and sandals. The possibilities are endless but one thing is for sure, you will get stopped at least 3x a day for a compliment on this skirt.
 
The Details

Marked Size: N/A

If it's an 80's themed prom dress your shopping for...you found it! Stellar formal/prom dress with prominent floral applique on front. Scoop neck with slight shoulder pads. Sheer sleeves and decolletage. Fully lined.  Three tiered ruffle bottom. Black sequin and lace throughout. Perfect with pumps and a satin clutch!

Marked Size: 9

Color: Black
Condition: Great
